name: 13 Bullets in Hyperspace (VR)
description:
You have received a help message and decide to go investigate, it seems that the AI of a spaceship has become self-aware and the robots are out of control, and you only have 13 bullets to defeat them! And also something about getting a tesseract? Good Luck!

Action VR game made in 9 days for the VRJam2022.

Controls: 

Move: Left joystick

Snap turn: Right Joystic

Grab: trigger

Shoot: The other trigger :)
